parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.64

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[Array]] of [[Number]]s, where numbers are IDs of all user actions added to given entity with [[addAction]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[actionIDs]] entity

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> entity: [[Object]] - entity with added user actions

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - Array with user action IDs
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_actions = [[actionIDs]] [[player]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[actionParams]], [[addAction]], [[setUserActionText]], [[inGameUISetEventHandler]], [[showHUD]], [[inputAction]], [[removeAction]], [[removeAllActions]], [[action]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
</dl>
<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 22, 2018 - 14:19 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:KC Grimes|KC Grimes]]</dt>
<dd class="note">The argument for this command can be global (ie, not local to the executing machine), however the returned array will only contain action IDs for locally executed [[addAction]].</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
